title: Twitter Under Elon Musk Is Starting to Look Like SpaceX
description: Division of duties at SpaceX, with a top executive overseeing daily operations and Musk handling engineering, could serve as a model for Twitter.

title: Elon Musk Says NBCUniversal Ad Boss Linda Yaccarino Is Twitter's New CEO
description: NBCU earlier announced she was leaving, effective immediately.

title: Twitter Under Elon Musk Is Starting to Look Like SpaceX
description: Division of duties at SpaceX, with a top executive overseeing daily operations and Musk handling engineering, could serve as a model for Twitter.

title: NBCUniversal's Linda Yaccarino Is in Talks to Become Twitter CEO
description: Yaccarino is chairman of global advertising and partnerships at NBCU. Twitter owner Elon Musk said earlier he had picked a new chief executive without naming the person.
